io.radar.sdk.model

Class RadarUser

  • io.radar.sdk.model.RadarUser

  • public class RadarUser

    Represents the current user state. For more information, see https://radar.io/documentation.

    See Also:
    https://radar.io/documentation

    • Constructor Summary

      Represents the current user state. For more information, see https://radar.io/documentation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadarUser

        public RadarUser(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String userId,
                 java.lang.String deviceId,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 org.json.JSONObject metadata,
                 android.location.Location location,
                 RadarGeofence[] geofences,
                 RadarPlace place,
                 RadarUserInsights insights,
                 boolean stopped,
                 boolean foreground,
                 RadarRegion country,
                 RadarRegion state,
                 RadarRegion dma,
                 RadarRegion postalCode,
                 RadarChain[] nearbyPlaceChains)

        Represents the current user state. For more information, see https://radar.io/documentation.

        Parameters:
        id - The Radar ID of the user.
        userId - The unique ID of the user, provided when you identified the user. May be null if the user has not been identified.
        deviceId - The device ID of the user.
        description - The optional description of the user.
        metadata - The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the user.
        location - The user's last known location.
        geofences - The user's last known geofences. May be null or empty if the user is not in any geofences. See https://radar.io/documentation/geofences.
        place - The user's last known place. May be null if the user is not at a place, or if Places is turned off. See https://radar.io/documentation/places.
        insights - Learned insights for the user. May be null if no insights are available, or if Insights is turned off. See https://radar.io/documentation/insights.
        stopped - A boolean indicating whether the user is stopped.
        foreground - A boolean indicating whether the user was last updated in the foreground.
        country - The user's last known country. May be null if country is not available or if Regions is turned off.
        state - The user's last known state. May be null if state is not available or if Regions is turned off.
        dma - The user's last known designated market area (DMA). May be null if DMA is not available or if Regions is turned off.
        postalCode - The user's last known postal code. May be null if postal code is not available or if Regions is turned off.
        nearbyPlaceChains - An array of nearby chains. May be null if no chains are nearby or if nearby chains are not enabled.
        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation
